mutants.code:
def reverse_string(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = ''.join((e for e in s if e.isalpha() or e.isspace()))
    s = s.replace('', '')
    return s[::-1]

    s = s.lower()
    s = ''.join((e for e in s if e.isalpha() or e.isspace()))
    s = s.replace(' ', 'MUTATED')
    return s[::-1]
